Cleaning temporary files

When performing tasks such as opening archives, Archiver may use temporary files. Normally these are cleaned up automatically when the task completes, but if Archiver quits unexpectedly these may be left behind on your disk.

If you find that, after using Archiver, your disk space is getting less, you may want to try cleaning these temporary files.

To clean temporary files:

Choose Action > Clean.
